description:
L'Oréal Men Pure Power Carbon Wash helps fight 5 male skin imperfections: oily skin, spots, marks, blackheads and roughness. This deeply cleansing formula draws out excess sebum for an intense, squeaky clean.

L'Oréal Men Expert Pure Carbon Facial Wash is enriched with black Oak Charcoal, a well-known purifying active for oily skin and acne-prone skin. Its deeply cleansing formula intensely cleans skin to help fight the 5 signs of oily skin, leaving skin fresh and purified. Specially formulated for men's skin.

Enriched with purifying Oak Charcoal to provide a deep, intense clean

Fights the 5 oily skin imperfections: spots, marks, oiliness, blackheads and roughness.

Deeply cleansing formula draws out excess sebum

Smooth texture with a fresh fragrance

Skin is left fresh, purifed and matte
name: L'oreal Men Expert Pure Charcoal Wash 100mL
